testcase.name: Login is successful
testcase.system-out: Given I visit /login endpoint...............................................passed When I enter userid 101 and password "password".............................passed Then I should get "Logged in successfully"..................................passed

testcase.name: Login is unsuccessful because incorrect password
testcase.system-out: Given I visit /login endpoint...............................................passed When I enter userid 101 and password "abcxyz"...............................passed Then I should get "ERROR: Incorrect Password"...............................passed

testcase.name: Login is unsuccessful because user not found
testcase.system-out: Given I visit /login endpoint...............................................passed When I enter userid 121 and password "password".............................passed Then I should get "ERROR: Not found user with Bank id 121"..................passed
